text: Oksana Stefanivna Hrytsai (; born March 5, 1986), also known as Mika Newton, is a Ukrainian singer and actress. She represented Ukraine at the Eurovision Song Contest 2011 and was fourth place. == Eurovision 2011 == Newton was picked to represent Ukraine in the Eurovision Song Contest 2011 in DÃ¼sseldorf, Germany. She sang "Angel". It is a song by Ruslan Kvinta and Maryna Skomorohova. In May 2011, in the final, Newton finished fourth with 159 points. == Personal life == In December 2018, Newton married talent agent Chris Saavedra. Her sister, Liliya Hrytsai, has been serving in the Ukrainian army since the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine. ==References== == Other websites == * * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian singers Category:Ukrainian actors
title: Mika Newton
